name: Commander
description: Soldiers who have mastered the art of leadership and battlefield control, able to inspire allies and coordinate devastating tactical maneuvers while maintaining exceptional personal combat prowess.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and tactical maneuvers
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and tactical abilities
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to attack speed and defensive capabilities
Can be temporarily boosted through adrenaline in critical situations
Leadership abilities can transfer stamina to allies or improve their regeneration

resource_systems.name: Combat Readiness
resource_systems.description: State of tactical awareness and preparation that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 15 when landing critical hits or successfully defending against attacks
Increases by 10 per 10 seconds in active combat
Decreases by 15 when taking critical hits or being caught off-guard
Decreases by 10 per minute when out of combat
Can be spent to enhance combat abilities or execute special maneuvers
Can be partially transferred to allies to improve their combat performance

resource_systems.name: Command Authority
resource_systems.description: Measure of leadership influence and tactical control over the battlefield
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully leading allies or controlling battlefield conditions
mechanics: Increases by 10 when allies successfully follow your tactical directions
Increases by 5 when maintaining advantageous battlefield positions
Decreases by 10 when allies suffer significant casualties under your command
Decreases by 5 when forced to retreat or lose tactical advantage
Can be spent to issue powerful commands or implement complex battle strategies

class_mechanics.name: Battlefield Leadership
class_mechanics.description: Ability to direct allies and coordinate complex tactical maneuvers
effects: Can issue commands that provide significant combat bonuses to allies
Able to coordinate group attacks that deal enhanced damage
Can establish formations that provide defensive or offensive advantages
Presence improves morale, reducing the effects of fear and intimidation
Can quickly analyze battlefield conditions and communicate optimal strategies

class_mechanics.name: Advanced Weapons Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Superior proficiency with weapons and understanding of combat techniques
effects: Significantly increased damage and accuracy with all conventional weapons
Can identify and exploit critical weaknesses in enemy defenses
Able to adapt fighting style to counter specific enemy tactics
Can teach effective combat techniques to allies, improving their performance
Presence intimidates enemies, potentially reducing their combat effectiveness

class_mechanics.name: Tactical Genius
class_mechanics.description: Exceptional understanding of battlefield dynamics and strategic planning
effects: Can predict enemy movements and prepare effective countermeasures
Able to identify and exploit terrain advantages for maximum tactical benefit
Can develop complex battle plans that account for various contingencies
Presence provides tactical insights to allies, improving their positioning
Can quickly adapt strategies when battlefield conditions change

class_mechanics.name: Inspiring Presence
class_mechanics.description: Charismatic leadership that motivates allies and intimidates enemies
effects: Allies within range gain bonuses to attack, defense, and morale
Can rally demoralized allies, removing fear effects and restoring combat effectiveness
Able to intimidate enemies, potentially causing them to hesitate or retreat
Presence naturally draws enemy attention, protecting more vulnerable allies
Can inspire heroic efforts from allies in critical situations

skill_trees.name: Master Tactician
key_abilities: Perfect Formation: Establish a formation that provides significant bonuses to all participating allies
Tactical Insight: Identify and mark enemy weaknesses, increasing damage dealt to those targets
Battlefield Control: Manipulate enemy positioning through superior tactical maneuvers

skill_trees.name: Inspiring Leader
key_abilities: Rally the Troops: Remove fear and demoralization effects from allies and grant temporary combat bonuses
Heroic Inspiration: Inspire an ally to perform beyond their normal capabilities for a short time
Commanding Presence: Passively improve the combat performance of nearby allies

skill_trees.name: Elite Warrior
key_abilities: Combat Mastery: Gain significant bonuses when using your preferred weapon type
Tactical Adaptation: Quickly adjust fighting style to counter enemy tactics
Veteran's Resolve: Ignore the effects of injuries and combat conditions that would hinder others

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 5 points in any soldier skill tree
challenges: Successfully lead a group in combat
Develop and implement an effective battle strategy

hero_classes.name: Champion
hero_classes.description: Commanders who embody the highest ideals of honor and justice, inspiring allies with their heroic deeds and selfless protection of the innocent.

hero_classes.name: Warlord
hero_classes.description: Commanders who focus on victory through superior tactics and battlefield dominance, valuing efficiency and results above all else.

hero_classes.name: Tyrant
hero_classes.description: Commanders who rule through fear and intimidation, crushing opposition with brutal tactics and forcing absolute obedience from their followers.

legendary_items.name: Banner of Command
effects: Allies within 30 meters gain +20% to attack and defense
Command Authority regeneration increased by 50%
Can be planted to create a rallying point that provides additional bonuses

legendary_items.name: Commander's Blade
effects: Attacks have a chance to mark enemies, increasing damage they take from all sources
Can be raised to issue commands with greater effect and range
Killing blows inspire nearby allies, restoring some of their resources

lore: Commanders represent soldiers who have transcended mere combat proficiency to become true leaders on the battlefield. Where ordinary soldiers focus primarily on their individual combat skills, Commanders develop the ability to coordinate groups, inspire allies, and control the flow of battle through superior tactical understanding. The path to becoming a Commander often involves formal leadership training in military academies or hard-earned experience leading troops in actual combat situations. Those who succeed gain not only enhanced personal combat abilities but also the respect and loyalty of those who serve under them. Commanders serve various roles in military organizations, from squad leaders who directly participate in combat alongside their troops to field generals who oversee large-scale operations. Some focus on inspiring heroic deeds from their followers, while others emphasize efficient tactics and battlefield control. Still others rule through intimidation and fear, demanding absolute obedience and crushing any sign of weakness. Regardless of their leadership style, all Commanders share an exceptional understanding of battlefield dynamics and the ability to bring out the best (or worst) in those who follow them. Their presence can turn the tide of battle, whether by coordinating devastating group attacks, maintaining defensive formations that withstand superior numbers, or simply inspiring ordinary soldiers to fight beyond their normal capabilities.
